definitions: Paid the bill and left a hotel or place of lodging.
Borrowed items from a library or recorded the purchase of items at a store.
Examined or inspected something to determine its condition or quality.
Verified or proved to be true or accurate.
Withdrew mentally or emotionally from a situation.
examples: They checked out of the hotel at noon.
She checked out three books from the library.
He checked out the engine for leaks.
His alibi checked out with the police.
He completely checked out during the meeting.
